au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L2=5.3mOff-quick
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(4498,300) # Drive guide to g5 driveGuide(guideConfig.g5) #set sample ap to 10 mm #sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guides in) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39, 0) driveBsz(262)
